data.title: DC Comics
data.meta_description: Posts about DC Comics written by Zack
data.text:
Tag Archives: DC Comics

My Best Articles Catch-Up Compilation

My continuing tendency to get distracted and work on things not posted online means that I haven’t updated in a spell. Let’s rectify that with some of the better articles I’ve done over the last couple of months. As I’m posting this on Halloween, here’s an article I wrote about some crazy haunted house events …

Continue reading “My Best Articles Catch-Up Compilation”

“Mathnet,” A Guy in a Monkey Suit, and Blackhawk: HOW THEY ALL CONNECT.

One of the shows I religiously watched growing up in the 1980s was SQUARE ONE TV, a math variation on SESAME STREET on PBS. I probably learned more about math from that than I did in actual class. My favorite segment was “Mathnet” a DRAGNET parody involving math. I actually saw this before I saw …

Continue reading ““Mathnet,” A Guy in a Monkey Suit, and Blackhawk: HOW THEY ALL CONNECT.”

Collection of Published Articles for 2013, Pt.1

UPDATED: This is going to be a repository for links to my published stuff for a bit. I haven’t been posting about toys because I got a paying gig blogging about them for MTV Geek! Here’s my first few posts: Power Lords Return Django Unchained Toys Pulled from Shelves Django Unchained Toys Now Banned on …

Continue reading “Collection of Published Articles for 2013, Pt.1”

Michael Green (KINGS) on ABC’s THE RIVER

Michael Green, creator of the acclaimed series Kings (which you can watch in its entirety on Hulu, is going to be a busy man at this year’s San Diego Comic-Con. Not only is he part of the much-anticipated DC Comics relaunch in September as co-writer of Supergirl [Click here to read a full interview about …

GREEN LANTERN Movie Review

Despite a few flickers of promise, Green Lantern burns out Posted by Zack Smith on Fri, Jun 17, 2011 at 2:35 PM Warner Bros Green Lantern Two stars Opens today everywhere Warner Brothers, which owns DC Comics, has a problem. They own 75 years’ worth of DC Comics characters, but only Superman and Batman have …

Bad Romance: Teen Titans with Bill Walko

Our increasingly unsettling series continues with a look at another of DC’s most beloved super-teams. Deathstroke and Terra ain’t even the worst here. Read on, if you date!

Bad Romance: Legion of Super-Heroes with Barry Lyga

Beginning a therapy-inducing new series about the worst relationships in superhero comics. This time out, Legion super-fan and YA author Barry Lyga guides us throug the worst Legion relationships ever! Read the full piece here!

Wednesday Comics 2: Who Do You Want to See?

Who would you like to see in DC’s follow-up to their acclaimed anthology? See our picks here!

Captain Marvel: The Shazam Years, Part 2

A look at the 1970s TV series SHAZAM! with star Jackson Bostwick, a spotlight on the late great Don Newton, and more! Read the full piece here!
